ï»¿Usain Bolt broke the 100-meter world record in 9.58 seconds.
Do you know what 9.58 seconds feels like?
...like your whole life passing under your feet,...
...like the entire nation is running it with you,...
...like the overwhelming rush of hurt was worth it.

This is what it feels like to be the fastest.
